Looping Alma,

 

Dear Team,

 

Please see my below comments in highlights, provide the below listed documents, Urgent items 1 to 4.

 

1.       Shop lease agreements @UAE Leasing <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>  – Ms. Suha, thanks for your email, the execution pages requires fitout period, opening date including name of the store, which is missing.  Please share the document reflecting the same.

2.       Shop Trade License @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

3.       Ejari not applicable in ADGM jurisdiction as per @Suha Abilmona <mailto:Suha.Abilmona@chalhoub.com> 

4.       Owner EI, Visa, Passport Copy, Client contact details (email, Phone number). @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>  Can you clarify what “owner” you are referring to?  Do you mean the owner of Allied Enterprises LLC?   Documents of Mr. Fadi.

5.       AMC – FA / FF by Real emirates Maintenance. @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 

6.       AMC – Pest control – TBC. @RealEmiratesSupplies <mailto:RealEmiratesSupplies@chalhoub.com> 

7.       24 x 7, Hassantuk, Safety certificate – Government Affairs team. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

 

This is very critical in starting the project, any delay in receiving the document will delay our handover date of 30 Sep 2024.

 

Appreciate your reply.

Dear Marc,

Hope my message finds you well and thanks a lot for the loop.

 

Dear @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>  please share tentative handover date by 3D and targeted opening date to assign the start date of our operational opening preparations.

 

I am looping in other parties to share the needed documents:

 

*	Shop lease agreements @UAE Leasing <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com> 
*	Shop Trade License @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 
*	Ejari not applicable in ADGM jurisdiction as per @Suha Abilmona <mailto:Suha.Abilmona@chalhoub.com>

*	AMC – FA / FF by Real emirates Maintenance. @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 
*	AMC – Pest control – TBC. @RealEmiratesSupplies <mailto:RealEmiratesSupplies@chalhoub.com> 
*	24 x 7, Hassantuk, Safety certificate – Government Affairs team. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

 

Best regards,

 

 

MOHAMED BATA​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

ABU DHABI

Subject: RE: Carolina Herrera, Galleria Mall, AUH, Client documents, Prestart documents - TL, Ejari, Lease, AMC, Hassantuk, Fitness certificate

 

Dear Natalia,

 

I believe all pending points and the responsibilities of each party were discussed during the meeting held last Friday where been attended by all concerned parties. However, as a recap, we are awaiting confirmation that the control panel has been installed in compliance with Civil Defense requirements.

chunks.text:
However, as a recap, we are awaiting confirmation that the control panel has been installed in compliance with Civil Defense requirements. Once confirmed, M. Areqi will approach Civil Defence to arrange a pre-survey visit. This pre-survey visit is mandatory for the installation of the Hassantuk device. Once the Hassantuk device is installed, the Hassantuk certificate can be issued, followed by the attestation of the AMC. The Hassantuk certificate and the attested AMC are required for the issuance of the Fitness certificate.

 

 

Dear Prathap,

Please note, if the result of pre-survey visit is a "failure", the next visit will be after 7 days of the first visit hence please ensure the installed panel and the contractor's installation is fully compliance with the CD requirements.

As you know, Mohammed can be reached on phone when he out of the office, hence Please reach via phone (as usual) once the control panel is installed, as he may not access emails these days due to tasks out of the office most of time.

Best regards

 

 

MOHAMMED EL NEEL​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ COMPLIANCE

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

Thanks Mohammed for looping me.

 

Dear All,

I wanted to inform you that we are currently experiencing technical difficulties with the ADGM portal (PFA). There seems to be an error glitch which has been reported to their IT team for resolution.

Rest assured, we are actively working on finding alternative solutions as this matter is of high priority to all parties. We will keep you updated on our progress.

Thank you for your understanding and patience during this time.

Subject: RE: Carolina Herrera, Galleria Mall, AUH, Client documents, Prestart documents - TL, Ejari, Lease

 

Dear Marc,

As you may be aware, the trade license renewal is pending the finalization of the lease contract on the new unit. We are trying to obtain an exception to renew the license at the new location without a lease. On the other hand, M. Areqi is attempting, through his contacts and influence, to use the expired license for the issuance of the police permit.

 

Best regards

 

MOHAMMED EL NEEL​​​​

SENIOR MANAGER ‑ COMPLIANCE

REAL EMIRATES LLC

DUBAI

Thanks & Regards

prathap pandiyan​​​​

m> >; Alma Quinto <Alma.Quinto@3d-consultants.com <mailto:Alma.Quinto@3d-consultants.com> >
Subject: RE: Carolina Herrera, Galleria Mall, AUH, Client documents, Prestart documents - TL, Ejari, Lease

 

Looping Alma,

 

Dear Team,

 

Please see my below comments in highlights, provide the below listed documents, Urgent items 1 to 4.

 

1.       Shop lease agreements @UAE Leasing <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com>  – Ms. Suha, thanks for your email, the execution pages requires fitout period, opening date including name of the store, which is missing.  Please share the document reflecting the same.

2.       Shop Trade License @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

3.       Ejari not applicable in ADGM jurisdiction as per @Suha Abilmona <mailto:Suha.Abilmona@chalhoub.com> 

4.       Owner EI, Visa, Passport Copy, Client contact details (email, Phone number). @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>  Can you clarify what “owner” you are referring to?  Do you mean the owner of Allied Enterprises LLC?   Documents of Mr. Fadi.

5.       AMC – FA / FF by Real emirates Maintenance. @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 

6.       AMC – Pest control – TBC. @RealEmiratesSupplies <mailto:RealEmiratesSupplies@chalhoub.com> 

7.       24 x 7, Hassantuk, Safety certificate – Government Affairs team. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

 

This is very critical in starting the project, any delay in receiving the document will delay our handover date of 30 Sep 2024.

 

Appreciate your reply.

Subject: RE: Carolina Herrera, Galleria Mall, AUH, Client documents.
Importance: High

 

Dear Marc,

Hope my message finds you well and thanks a lot for the loop.

 

Dear @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>  please share tentative handover date by 3D and targeted opening date to assign the start date of our operational opening preparations.

 

I am looping in other parties to share the needed documents:

 

*	Shop lease agreements @UAE Leasing <mailto:uaeleasing@chalhoub.com> 
*	Shop Trade License @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 
*	Ejari not applicable in ADGM jurisdiction as per @Suha Abilmona <mailto:Suha.Abilmona@chalhoub.com> 
*	Owner EI, Visa, Passport Copy, Client contact details (email, Phone number). @Prathap Pandiyan <mailto:Prathap.Pandiyan@3d-consultants.com>  Can you clarify what “owner” you are referring to?  Do you mean the owner of Allied Enterprises LLC?  
*	AMC – FA / FF by Real emirates Maintenance. @Retail Maintenance <mailto:RetailMaintenance@chalhoub.com> 
*	AMC – Pest control – TBC. @RealEmiratesSupplies <mailto:RealEmiratesSupplies@chalhoub.com> 
*	24 x 7, Hassantuk, Safety certificate – Government Affairs team. @Government Affairs <mailto:Government.Affairs@chalhoub.com> 

 

Best regards,

 

 

MOHAMED BATA​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ RSO

ALLIED ENTERPRISES LLC

ABU DHABI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 563 2000

+971508158454
